structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. For text effective July 1, 2012, see below.] If in the opinion of the chief justice for administration and management of the trial court such fireproof rooms are insufficient, he shall certify the need of additional accommodations to the general court. Chapter 215: Rooms for records; additional space [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 93, Sec. 71 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137. For text effective until July 1, 2012, see above.] If in the opinion of the court administrator of the trial court such fireproof rooms are insufficient, he shall certify the need of additional accommodations to the general court.
